attributes.action: Reinstate death penalty for murder of Police Officers
attributes.additional_details: With swingeing cuts to Police numbers and budgets our Officers will be facing a lot more danger and must be better protected. Any assault on a Police Officer including social media video, without  conducting  a professional standards or PCC  investigation must be punished with a mandatory prison sentence of sufficient severity as to deter
attributes.background: If we as a Nation want to boast of a largely unarmed Police Service we must protect them with the full weight of the Law.
